multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: rates; Fed policy signals rate cuts, expected to lower UST 10Y yields by 10‑20 bp and strengthen the dollar (DXY up 0.5‑1 %).

category.motivation: The article discusses Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s comments at Jackson Hole, which is an official statement from a policymaker, reshaping expectations for rate cuts.
